DOC.brief_summary: This study exploratory trial evaluate tear film break-up time single eye drop instillation over-the-counter artificial tear . The primary hypothesis tear film break time great test control eye .
DOC.brief_title: Tear Film Break-up Time After Instillation Artificial Tears
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects vary degree dry eye syndrome enrol randomize , control , double mask , single site study . A new formulation artificial tear contain glycerin 1 % active polylysine-graft-polyethylene glycol excipient compare leading commercial product propylene glycol ( 0.3 % ) polyethylene glycol ( 0.4 % ) active ingredient hydroxypropyl-guar gelling agent . The primary outcome comparison tear film stability eye drop instillation .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year symptoms dry eye history ophthalmic problem Use ocular lubricant ointment past 36 hour use contact lens excessive eye lid cosmetic study day
